text:
-Who said you could drink
my whiskey?

-This isn't for me.
It's for you.
-Why do I need a drink, Harvey?

-He wouldn't be getting anything
if you hadn't done what you did.

I'm not going to apologize
for it.
So you want to come at me again,

or you want to help
me put him back in?

-Can it be both?
It's good to see you.

-Wish I could say the same.
-I didn't mean it.

-You can make yourself one
of these.

-I got a better idea.
Finish that off.

Let's go out
and have a good time.

'Cause tomorrow we're gonna
take a flight to New York

and make sure
that son of a bitch
never sees the light of day.
